Welcome to SignifyX!
Your ultimate tool for seamless communication through sign language.
SignifyX is designed to support the American, French, and Arabic Sign Language Alphabets, enabling you to effortlessly interact with deaf and hard-of-hearing individuals. Whether you are learning signs or assisting someone in need, this app bridges the gap, empowering conversations and fostering understanding across cultures and languages.
Swipe up to open the settings panel

Modes
SignifyX offers two powerful modes to enhance your experience:

Camera Mode: This mode enables real-time sign detection using your phone’s camera. Simply tap the Camera button in the navigation bar, and your camera will open, ready to detect signs as they happen. For the best experience, position yourself about 1 to 2 meters away from the camera and perform your signs. The app will instantly recognize them, displaying the results on the bottom left corner of your screen. Whether you’re practicing or communicating, Camera Mode brings sign language to life, effortlessly bridging the communication gap.

Gallery Mode: Want to analyze signs from an image or video? Gallery Mode has you covered. By tapping the Gallery button in the navigation bar, you’ll be taken to a new page where you can upload content. Tap the \'+\' button in the bottom right to choose an image or video from your device. Once uploaded, the app will detect the signs—showing results frame by frame if it’s a video. This feature allows you to explore sign language with precision, providing a detailed breakdown of each frame.

Settings Panel
When you swipe up from the bottom of the screen, you unlock a range of settings that allow you to personalize your experience and make SignifyX work better for you:
Inference Time: Control how quickly signs are detected and interpreted. This option allows you to balance speed and accuracy, adjusting the detection time to suit your device capabilities and needs.
Detection Threshold: This setting allows you to adjust the sensitivity of the sign detection. Whether you\'re in a well-lit room or a more challenging environment, you can tweak this threshold to ensure accurate recognition of your signs.
Tracking Threshold: Fine-tune how closely the app tracks the movement of your signs in real-time. Whether you want ultra-precise tracking or a more fluid experience, this option lets you decide what works best for your situation.
Presence Threshold: Adjust how confidently the app detects the presence of a hand before starting recognition. Whether you want instant detection for quick interactions or a more deliberate confirmation to reduce false triggers, this setting lets you control the sensitivity to suit your needs.
